ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated pizza dough, separated into 8 portions
1 large jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced

cookingTips: Remove jalapeno seeds to control heat level in the cookies
Distribute cheese and jalapeno evenly across each dough portion
Bake until golden and cheese is melted and bubbling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create savory appetizers by properly preparing jalapenos and distributing toppings evenly on pizza dough.
